cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eri

sentence.kanji: 襟の大きいコートを買いました。
sentence.romaji: eri no ookii ko-to wo kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought a coat with a large collar.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shisha

sentence.kanji: 来月大阪に支社を開設します。
sentence.romaji: raigetsu oosaka ni shisha wo kaisetsu shimasu
sentence.english: A branch office will be established in Osaka next month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagusameru

sentence.kanji: 友人が慰めてくれました。
sentence.romaji: yuujin ga nagusamete kuremashita

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinou

sentence.kanji: 昨日、友達に会った。
sentence.romaji: kinou tomodachi ni ata

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikaku

sentence.kanji: 駅の近くで食事をした。
sentence.romaji: eki no chikaku de shokuji wo shita

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikai

sentence.kanji: 駅はここから近いです。
sentence.romaji: eki ha koko kara chikai desu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikaku

sentence.kanji: 私の家は駅の近くです。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ie ha eki no chikaku desu
sentence.english: My house is near the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukuru

sentence.kanji: 今、朝ご飯を作っています。
sentence.romaji: ima asagohan wo tsukute imasu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hontouni

sentence.kanji: あなたが本当に好きです。
sentence.romaji: anata ga hontouni suki desu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's magaru

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shigoto

sentence.kanji: 3月は仕事が忙しい。

sentence.english: I have a lot of work in March.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's neru

sentence.kanji: もう寝よう。

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daiji

sentence.kanji: お体をお大事に。
sentence.romaji: okarada wo odaiji ni

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chizu

sentence.kanji: 地図を見て来てください。
sentence.romaji: chizu wo mite kite kudasai
sentence.english: Please look at the map to get here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaji

sentence.kanji: 火事です。119番に電話してください。
sentence.romaji: kaji desu hyakujuukyuuban ni denwa shite kudasai

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinjo

sentence.kanji: 近所にカナダ人が住んでいる。
sentence.romaji: kinjo ni kanadajin ga sunde iru
sentence.english: A Canadian lives in my neighborhood.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juusho

sentence.kanji: この住所に行ってください。
sentence.romaji: kono juusho ni ite kudasai

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's benjo

sentence.kanji: 便所はそこです。
sentence.romaji: benjo ha soko desu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's basho

sentence.kanji: 会社の場所を教えてください。
sentence.romaji: kaisha no basho wo oshiete kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell me where the office is.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saikin

sentence.kanji: それは最近話題の本ですね。
sentence.romaji: sore ha saikin wadai no hon desu ne
sentence.english: That's the book that people have been talking about lately.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tantou

sentence.kanji: 私はセールスを担当しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha se-rusu wo tantou shite imasu

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hontou

sentence.kanji: その話は本当ですか。
sentence.romaji: sono hanashi ha hontou desu ka

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's isogu

sentence.kanji: 私たちは駅へ急ぎました。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha eki he isogimashita

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuuni

sentence.kanji: 急に用事を思い出した。
sentence.romaji: kyuuni youji wo omoidashita
sentence.english: I suddenly remembered I have something to do.

cards.english: express train, going in a hurry

sentence.romaji: kono e ha goho no sakuhin da
sentence.english: This painting is one of van Gogh's works.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mageru

sentence.english: I first traveled to Kyoto the year before last.

sentence.kanji: 彼は一人旅の計画を立てた。

cards.english: at that time, at the present time
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touji

sentence.kanji: 彼女は当時、まだ3才だった。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha touji mada sansai data
sentence.english: She was only three years old at the time.

sentence.kanji: 一昨日彼から電話がありました。
sentence.romaji: ototoi kare kara denwa ga arimashita
sentence.english: There was a phone call from him the day before yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokyuu

sentence.kanji: 東京まで特急で3時間かかります。
sentence.romaji: toukyou made tokyuu de sanjikan kakarimasu
sentence.english: It takes three hours to Tokyo by special express.

sentence.kanji: 新しい歯ブラシが必要だ。
sentence.romaji: atarashii haburashi ga hitsuyou da

sentence.kanji: 食事の用意ができました。

sentence.kanji: サラダの材料をそろえました。
sentence.romaji: sarada no zairyou wo soroemashita
sentence.english: I have all the ingredients for the salad.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's junbi

sentence.kanji: 明日の会議の準備をした。
sentence.romaji: asu no kaigi no junbi wo shita

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiroku

sentence.romaji: marason de sekai kiroku ga deta
sentence.english: There was a new world record in the marathon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ataru

sentence.romaji: bo-ru ga kare no atama ni atata
sentence.english: The ball hit him on the head.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rokuon

sentence.kanji: そのラジオ番組はもう録音しました。
sentence.romaji: sono rajio bangumi ha mou rokuon shimashita
sentence.english: I've already recorded that radio show.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kagaku

sentence.kanji: 科学は常に進歩している。
sentence.romaji: kagaku ha tsuneni shinpo shite iru

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saiyou

sentence.romaji: sono kaisha ha josei wo ooku saiyou shite iru

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sonaeru

sentence.romaji: saigai ni sonaete tairyou no mizu wo kaikonda
sentence.english: I bought large quantities of water to prepare for disasters.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jiken

sentence.romaji: sono jiken no hannin ha mada tsukamate inai
sentence.english: The perpetrator of the incident hasn't been caught yet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuube

sentence.kanji: 昨夜、流れ星を見ました。
sentence.romaji: yuube nagareboshi wo mimashita
sentence.english: I saw some shooting stars last night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakunen

sentence.english: Last year there were a lot of earthquakes.
